How to run Lobpcg on Linux (using csh)

Run Lobpcg using Linux with csh shell files

{{{test1}}}
{{{
# Assume jar files stored at $HOME/JarFiles
# set classpath for java
setenv CLASSPATH $HOME/JarFiles/sparse-eig-01.jar:$HOME/JarFiles/mtj-0.9.14.jar:$HOME/JarFiles/netlib-java-0.9.3.jar:$HOME/JarFiles/arpack_combined_all.jar

java  test.sparse.eigensolvers/TestLobpcg
}}}


{{{test2.bat}}}
{{{
rem Assume jar files stored in C:\JarFiles
set CLASSPATH=.;C:\JarFiles\sparse-eig-01.jar;C:\JarFiles\mtj-0.9.14.jar;C:\JarFiles\netlib-java-0.9.3.jar;C:\JarFiles\arpack_combined_all.jar

rem Compile and run your own java class
javac ExampleLaplacianOperator.java
java ExampleLaplacianOperator
pause
